content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house watching a storm in the distance through my window to see if it was headed this way. i was facing eastward. the sky was overcast and no stars were visible but there was lightning far in the distance.

as i was watching the sky suddenly there was this blue tinged object that almost looked like a very bright star just appear out of nowhere traveling from left to right in my field of vision. there was no sparks or any kind of trail. there was no curvature to the flight path, i just flew very straight. there was also no sound or solid surface that i could hear or see.

it came in at a shallow angle towards the ground blinked 3 times and disappeared behind a house, but just as quickly came back up at a sharper angle then it had entered. it then changed angle again to a more level trajectory with the horizon and blinked 3 times again as it did so. it continued on to where i couldn't see it because the side of the house was in the way. the blinking was sequential in that the 6 blinks were as far as i could tell all the same duration.

i cannot say how far away or how big it was i just don't know. but i do know that it was below the clouds and moving very fast. as for feelings and reactions i was dumbstruck and stood for probably a couple minutes just trying to wrap my head around what i had just seen. i know 100% what it was not...It was not a plane, helicopter, or meteor. i see planes and helicopters all the time and i've actually seen lots of meteors and fireballs, but this was none of them.

was it "ball lightning"...Maybe but from the pictures i've seen of ball lightning and peoples descriptions of it...This looked nothing like it.

the first pic is a drawing i made in ms paint that shows the full path that i saw the object moving. the second pic is an actual photo taken maybe 5 minutes later of the area. i set the exposure to 15 seconds and increased the gamma so you can see the area clearly. in reality it was very dark outside.
content.summary: Very bright fast moving ball of bluish/white light that changed direction twice and blinked 6 times before i lost sight of it.

content.detailedDescription: It was just before 2:30 in the morning just outside of manchester, uk and i stepped out the back to have a cigarette. as always i looked up into the sky to look at the stars. i was looking at one particular group of stars when i noticed that the group seemed to be moving. as i looked closer i could see that it was actually just one star that was moving northbound in a straight line. as i watched it i noticed that it was brightly pulsating at a rate of around every 10 seconds. because it was so far up i couldn't make out any definitive shape to it. it looked just like another star to me. i thought to myself that it could have been a plane, but i've seen hundreds of planes in my time and none of them ever pulsated like this before, and besides, this was moving much faster than any plane i've ever seen. i was watching it pass over the house and not 2 seconds after it passed from view i saw a shooting star follow in almost same trajectory as the ufo. i've also seen quite a few shooting stars in my time as well, but this one seemed to have a really long blueish trail behind it, and it wasn't traveling downwards either. it was moving horizontally following the exact path of the ufo at an incredibly fast speed, but it didn't sort of die out as most shooting stars do. it had a fairly consistent trail behind it. because it also passed over the house, i couldn't see weather it actually made contact with the ufo or not, but it did seem to me that whatever it was, it was fired with some intention of hitting the ufo. i knew that as soon as it had passed over the house that i wasn't going to see anymore as the view was completely blocked by other houses in the street. i continued watching for another couple of minutes to see if anything else would happen to no avail. 10 minutes later i'm writing this report to mufon. hopefully someone else saw something as well. possibly some sort of impact maybe, but it is very early in the morning so i doubt many other people would be even be awake. anyway thanks for your time and who knows, maybe there's more to this story to come.
content.summary: Fast pulsating ufo followed by some sort of missile

content.detailedDescription:
May 20, 2010 mesa, az 11:14am

  i was on my computer which is situated in front of a screened and tinted window when i just happen to glance towards the window into the sky,  and i saw an orange and round object about the size of a balloon slowly traversing in the sky.  the distinctly orange and round object also seemed to me to be a little fuzzy on its outer surface.  the object appeared to be no further away than 200 to 300 feet from my location, and the orange object seemed to be about 100 to 150 feet up in the air in altitude.
  i stared at the orange object for a few seconds wondering to myself what it could be when i decided to quickly go onto my porch (which that part took about 2-3 seconds) and to take some pictures of the orange object.  however, when i went outside onto my porch and intensely scanned the area with my eyes where the orange object should had been located,  i saw no signs of the orange object still being in the sky.  this left me baffled about its disappearance since the object was very bright orange and once nearby my location.  this occurrence also happened to me before in the recent past. 

 therefore,  i quickly decided (with the zoom set at its lowest of 70mm and the  focus set for distant scenery) to take some random pictures in a circular pattern in the general area the orange object was last seen with the hope of the camera capturing something (which the object may still be somewhat visible for the camera to detect  but not with my eyes.)  i took l1 pictures: only 1 picture shows a round object which is not orange; another pictures show a black and flat object which i am suspecting that object in that picture possibly being  a black bird flying.  however, upon enhancing the picture (that i think might be a bird) with  the fade enhancements to bring out more colors, the object also had orange color in it rather than just black colors.

this settles my thinking of possibly seeing things when the facts is: there was something that was  flying which was a small and bright orange object that just simply appeared to vanish.  now the real question: what was that object because it surely was not a balloon or plane i saw flying in the air?
content.summary: Bright and small orange object slowly traverses sky which mysteriously vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I recently purchased a 200mw laser/ flashlight and was very excited about it. the plan was to point at stars with my kids and maybee tease the cat with it on occasion. on the day of the sighting, i left work at 10:30 and noticed three round objects in the sky. i pulled over and studied the objects and after skanning the sky i saw hundreds of what i knew to be balloons. it was the last day of school for the kids and a local school or event must have let the kids release balloons. it got me thinking of aircraft, ufos and related things. that evening a thunder storm came through with many extremely close lightning strikes. we were a bit unnerved but went outside to play around in the puddles after the storm passed. the sun was going down and i decided to show my boys the kool laser and what it could do after dinner. at around 8:00 we went outside and i pointed to the ground with the star/map attachment and my boys were fascinated. we walked out into the yard and pointed to a bright star in the east. i then proceeded to point to the moon towards the west and at that instant my oldest son (7) yelled out "dad whats that???" i first looked at my son and then at the direction he was looking and was stunned to see a large bright-white orb less than one mile away to the left of the moon, very close to where i was pointing the laser. i was shocked because i did not even see it untill my son pointed it out, even though it was so bright. immediatly i noticed another bright white light coming from the direction i first trained my laser. it was equaly distanced. it was speeding towards the first object. there were other aircraft at multiple altitudes, (we live near btr airport) but these two objects were different. they were bright like the sun at midday (about the size of my thumb at arms length)and although they were moving away from my location, they did not change in brightness or appearance, nor did they have any strobing or anti-collision avoidence. they slowly dissapeared behind the tree line. my kids and i were frightened and we immediatly went into the house. we love aircraft and know of nearly every shape and size in the books. but i'v never seen these characteristics before.
content.summary: Extremely bright star-like orbs attracted by 200mw laser

content.detailedDescription: I was with my friend driving down mountain or lickskillet rd. (i'm not sure of which road)in harris county at apporximately 5:30 am edt, when both of us saw a flash of white light, very close to the ground, that lasted 3-5 seconds. i thought the object was a car's headlights, but the flash occured roughly 20 ft. in front my friend's car, and the nearest intersection was roughly 500 ft. away. the flash in question appeared and disappeared very quickly. my first reaction was, "what the ****!". i was basically petrified with fear and supirse for the next 20 minutes.
content.summary: Flash of white light apporximately 5 ft. off ground

content.detailedDescription: I didn't know i had filmed it, i was walking near the old army post or fort called ft.Snelling. i was on the south end of the wall of the fort. as i was walking away from the fort towards the mississippi river. i heard what sounded like a loud boom noise, like when they fire the cannons at the fort in the summer, the fort is not open now. i comment in the video of the noise and pan towards the the north and the wall of the fort. later upon viewing the clip, you can see a large white sphere or circular object appear just after i mention the loud noise. it's around the 3:37 mark on the clip, i put a square around the area on the clip. i still have the original clip on my computer and my hard drive of my video camera.This occurred around 1:44 p.M and was on may 18th, 20010. when i view the object on the video it seems to materialize quickly and then fades away.  iv tried to submit the video file and a couple of still shots from the video. it doesn't submit, when i push the submit button with the video file and two pictures. it just processes and never submits?
content.summary: Large white sphere or round object

content.detailedDescription: Well i was out side my house. and i happen to look up and i saw this objest in the sky and at first i throught it was a bird. but then it stood still for a minutes or 2 with no movement at all. so i call my mom to bring the bonuculars. and to hurry so my mom said what is it. and she ran out with them my mom stood there to get a better look while i look threw the binuculars and i said mom you wont believe this. i said it's a key up there mom. and she said what. she grab them from me and the first words from her my was omg. i took them back and maybe about 2 minutes it started to move. with back jerks and forward jerks. while looking it turn into a tear drop. along with this was 2 balls silver in color and it was almost as if they where watching. then the two balls spread apart from each other. and all at once they where join together. well the object glided across our sky into it disappeared. and the thing is someone else in fresno saw what we saw. and it was posted on abovetopsecret. and also youtube. well i seen this and my family with our own eyes. and we saw it clear as day because it was right over our house. and we watch it seem like forever. this was strange. i have heard people say they saw something. but not knowing that one day i would too. so do what you like with this infro. but i now know that something strange is happening. did not take any pic. but the infro is on youtube. someone else posted. and abovetopsecret. when i saw the object it was daytime.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Key shape then into a tear drop.

content.detailedDescription:
Left work at 18:45 headed to subway for dinner as i was headed home back towards my work i saw what appeared to be space junk but then i thought it was street lights until i started to follow these lights. and realised they were a good 20km out of the city i live in. its a dry open treeless area for miles. saw the orbs in darkest and noticed them to be of an orange appearance and the orbs were stationary. they were roughly around 1200ft in the air give or take from my postion at about 5km away from me. they were appearing in random formation at times 3 or 2 then none then 1 to 3. there was no mist, fire, glow, smoke, flame or sparks. just 3 clear circular orange orbs. they didnt move erratically they just phased in and out. this carried on for a good 30minutes. i do have some film of this event. its on my mobile so not the greatest quality. i also informed my grandmother and she witnessed this event. the orbs had completely gone by the time i checked again, which was a good 30minutes later.
i worked out as many theories as possible for this event to be explained rationally. but the pure height of these orbs ruled out the possiblity of a man made light source, the fact that they randomly appeared in the sky and were suspended in mid air neither moving left or right just purly suspended in the air, makes me believe it was not an aircraft or helicopter and there was no sounds, the night was very quiet with only traffic on the rare occassion the temperature was around 18 degrees a rather cool night with no cloud cover with open skys.
im an industrial electrican in my opinion it wasnt a man made light source. also fire ruled out becuase of its colour and the way it appeared and dissapeared. maybe you or your team could come up with a solution or have others got any hard evidence to what it could of been since this is very unusual. finally about two days before this night a place called kadine about 300km away from whyalla also had similar appearing orbs and appariently many towns people saw it. reguards [cms/tg/pid].
please email me at [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Orange orb 3 of them randomly appearing at times one or two to zero random intervals

content.detailedDescription:
1- me encontraba en la cama sin poder dormir y sin saber por que tuve la necesidad de ir afuera de mi casa , tome un cigarrillo y sali , mire al cielo   como lo hago siempre por que me encanta mirar las estrellas ; cosa que hago con el programa stellarium para no confundir lo que estoy viendo, y fue ahi cuando me llamo la atencion este destello tan particular.

2- al verlo por unos segundos me di cuenta que lo que veia no era una estrella ni un avion; primero por que las estrellas no se conportan asi y no conozco una aeronave  que haga ese tipo de maniobras; entr��������� en mi casa tome mi camara de fotos y la puse en modo de filmacion y comenze a filmar el objeto. tome cuatro videos cortos del mismo , ya que sorpresivamente se empezo a quedar sin baterias.

4- en un primer momento solo se veia una luz destellante con movimientos elipticos y luego estacionarios, luego para mi sorpresa al ver los videos en el cpu es cuando me doy cuenta que aparecen otras dos luces que empiezan a encenderse en secuencia y luego forman un triangulo.

5- durante la filmacion sentia paz, y la necesidad de filmarlo no se por que pero eso era lo que sentia, estaba tranquilo ya que no es la primera vez que observo un objeto de este tipo.

6- solo desaparecio asi como si nada , se apago , como si uno apagara la luz.
content.summary: Posible ovni sobre buenos aires, argentina.

content.detailedDescription: I got a call from a friend (at about 10:10pm on 5/19/10) to look at some weird lights in the sky.  he described them as red and blue lights moving back and forth.  i looked out the west facing window of my house and saw 4 red lights, hovering stationary.  i immediately went outside and brought 2 of my friends.  when i got out there i saw nothing at first. i did immediately notice multiple helicopters in the sky, at least 3, circling this area.  as i rounded the corner of my house i saw 4 red lights in a horizontal row, quickly rising over the building to my west then abruptly the 4 red lights became one bright blue light.  simultaneously the object made a 180 degree change of direction with no deceleration or acceleration of any kind that i could see.  we immediately went to our friends��� vantage point to see if anyone had captured this event on film.  we found eye witnesses, but no one who had recorded the event.  we went to the beach to see if we could see it further out in the sky or over the water, no such luck.  after about an hour we decided to call every news organization in our area and find out what was going on and why the helicopters were in the sky.  every news channel that covers sarasota confirmed that they did not have any helicopters in the air.  that leaves the police and the military as possible owners of the helicopters circling the event.  i called the sheriff���s department and they said that they had no knowledge of their choppers being in use tonight.  we had 2 vantage points between my friends who had initially noticed it and myself.  it was directly west of me and directly north of them.  from this we were able to figure out approximately where the object was.  i was near clark rd. and lockwood ridge road looking directly west, the others were near gulf gate drive and superior avenue looking almost directly north.  from this we could tell how far we were from it.  based on our best guess we assume that this object was at least as large a 747 and it moved like a kite.  never seen anything like this before and have no rational explanation for what we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 bright red lights in a row, floated back and forth like a kite.  transformed into 1 blue object, dropped and flew from the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On the beautiful evening of march 4, 2010 @ 8:36 pm, i was traveling home from work from granbury to lipan on fm4. about 10 miles out from granbury, heading west, i caught a glimpse of an unusual light flickering in the western night sky. i ignored it for a few seconds... and was thinking to myself it was must be a plane on arrival to kdfw or a plane passing through at a high altitude through the different classes of airspace. all of a sudden the flickering light transitioned into a continuous brilliant amber glow; at this point i had to pull over to analyze what i was witnessing. this ufo i was viewing was within 25-30 miles and about 25*-30* above the horizon line. the craft seemed to be hovering with no movement for a few seconds and then it would slowly move from south to north. there were six total pulsating amber colored lights illuminating this craft rendering a diamond shape, possibly triangular pattern. again, this craft was within a 20-30nm visibility range on this clear night and was not just another *dot*, w/ strange lights you see from time to time that turn out to be a airliner deviating to assigned vor stations issued by the ftw ctr atc - whick this process sometimes will trick the eye into thinking it must be an ufo. after a minute or two on the shoulder of fm 4, two other vehicles were pulled over in front of... and behind me, but not close enough to verbally share the experience. i decided to attempt to catch video of the lights with my rca pocket size dvr, but the zoom is very limited and had zero success. i then decided to use my canon dsr camera with a 70-200mm l lens, but to my disappointment the craft and it's lights were gone once i turned on the camera. i thought, ���isn���t that typical???��� to myself. so... after waiting a few more minutes i decided to move on up the road, wife and kids were waiting on me. as i put my vehicle into drive and began rolling onto the pavement, i noticed the craft and the lights again, but by the time i disembarked the vehicle with my camera it was gone. all gone!
i���ve been in the aviation business a long time, primarily design and recreational flying, for me it���s not just a hobby... it���s a passion besides my lord and my family. this was not any type of aircraft that i���ve been exposed to in my life of 31 years. the lighting being transmitted from this ufo was not of any pattern that would resemble military/ airline/ civilian aircraft being used in today's time. pilots are trained to identify the color/patterns of strobes on aircraft and distinguishing between military or civilian a/c. 
so is this another military special ops training mission to the brownwood moa??? most residents of this tri-county area are routinely exposed to these exercises and see ch-46s, uh-60s, c-130s, f-16s, f-18s, etc, flying hard and low all over these parts at all times of the day. that���s normal flight traffic to me and expect it without warning night and day. is this ufo a top secret a/c the us military is testing at night in around this airspace? maybe. are alien ufos visiting the wind turbines located in this area where i���ve calculated the lights/craft to be orbiting (32.4229325564, -98.4531027856)? maybe. or is it the military's way of replacing the shuttle program... we wish!
i have been procrastinating posting this sighting for several weeks, but lately have been motivated by one more sighting. this, most recent, sighting happened two nights ago, may 17, 2010, when my wife and i were enjoying the stars from outside our country home around 10pm or so. we were walking across the yard and we both noticed a bright amber colored light very low to the horizon, we both immediately thought it was a satellite or a weather balloon. the lights we were seeing were the same lights that i witnessed back in march. somehow we managed to miss the lights earlier due to our eyes being focused in the skies watching satellites pass over. we witnessed this sighting for about 2 minutes and as we began to get a better view from my hilltop it vanished. they'll be back... =)
content.summary: Ufo was within 30 nm when noticed, traveling at slow speed with amber lighting s to n @ 20-25* above horizon - very large

content.detailedDescription:
Came home from work it was about 10:00 pm my husband and i were in our back yard laying in the grass looking up at the beautiful sky and talking about the stars and constellation's and how clear it was out that night because you could see all the stars so clearly and this very bright light came flying across the sky (east to west) stopped abruptly and turned right and took off just as fast as it came and was gone in a matter of seconds.  my husband (not a believer) turned and looked at me and said did you see that (very wide eyed) i said yes and then asked him what did he see, he confirmed the same thing that i saw but did not say anything and then i asked him what did he think it was and he said he did not know because it did not match anything that he ever saw or knew about.  there were no blinking lights, not an air craft, not a shutting star or meteor because it stopped and then turned right plus we have seen the meteor showers and shooting stars before, plus i am a disabled vet i served in the us army.  we looked to see if there were any satellites in our area at the time and we could not find anything stating that their was.  being born and raised in titusville, florida i am familiar with nasa and space debris.  at present time we have not seen this anomaly again.  we have seen the space station all sorts of flying aircraft, meteor showers but nothing like we saw that night. this siting has really pricked my interest even more to learn and find as much information as i can about our universe.  we still talk about this today between us because we have looked and tried to match anything we could to this and nothing even comes close not even a satellite can stop dead and turn and take off just as fast as it came. not like this did that night. 



bright light in the shape of an oval moving fast.
content.summary: Sort of oval light

content.detailedDescription:
To whoever wants to read,

i was putting the garbage out and as i walked down the driveway i was thinking how i see repeated patterns in the sky in relation to the locations of stars...(i had been outback a few minutes prior watching the sky and i saw the fastest shooting star i've ever seen).. anyway i'm walking down the driveway and i fixate on two stars in the northeast sky, as i'm looking at them they rotate and switch locations... this feeling overtook me like is this real? did i really see that? i stopped walking as soon as they started to rotate and i stared at them for a moment then the one of them started heading north further away from me.  i dropped my garbage bag i headed down the street after it.  until it faded away in the distance.  i'm pretty sure the other light that stayed behind was gone because this happened near a pretty bright star and their weren't any bright enough objects to match what i saw near by when i looked for it. 

these lights i saw were standing still when i fixated on them. then after a moment or two they swung around each other like as if they were magnetically retracted or attracted to or from each other.  i'm positive this is what i saw.  i live near mcguire air force base so maybe they were doing some high altitude test flights or something but it sure got me excited.  hey i'm not a kook i know what i saw i'm just not sure what i was looking at.  maybe somebody else saw it too.

thanks for reading,
joe
content.summary: I saw 2 stars dance and one flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
Returning from wal-mart on loop 1604 and nacogdoches towards the live oak and universal city area.

noticed a strobe light flash at about 45 degrees in elevation headed in a downward trajectory towards the live oak area.  it traveled about 10 degrees in a second, flashed again, traveled another ten degrees in a half second, partial flash and gone.  the object appeared to be at low altitude, below what appeared to be a light cloud deck and traveling at high speed towards the live oak city area or northeast san antonio.

i was unable to see the object other than the single white strobe flashes. there were no other lights of any kind. it appeared to be traveling at very high speed.

there were no trails, tails, sparking, debris etc that would indicate this was a meteor.

once i realized this was not likely a conventional aircraft by its speed and none of the "lighting" that accompanies a meteor there was a sense of excitement that i may have finally spotted "another one" after many years.

i spent a few days replaying the scene in my head to make sure that it was not a trick of light or other phenomena such as light reflections/glare on a windshield.  i am relatively certain of what it was not and am now reporting it.
content.summary: Single strobe moving at very high speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was the evening of 18th may 2010,at around 5:30p.M. i was at my parents home when i looked out at sky at the dark clouds that were passing by and thought i'd go take a look,they soon blew over, as i was outside i looked around the sky then to the west i noticed a black sphere like object, now i have seen these on 2 other occassions in coventry whilst at friends houses,    this time it was closer than before but soon drifted higher then stayed at a high altitude and moved very slowly across the sky towards the north i knew it was moving slowly as i lined the object up with a hole in the fence, i continued watching it for about 15 mins whilst i ate my sandwich outside on the bench, i then went into the house to take the plate and cup back and get my bag and jacket to go out on my bike, i was about 4-5mins and when i came back outside it was nowhere to be seen, it was fairly clear not many clouds so i would have thought i would be able to see it again easily but even as i went out on my bike i looked for it but still could not see it anywhere.
 the other 2 sightings were in the afternoon time on a weekday (not sure of dates and times) but my first sighting was a black orb at high altitude and i said to 2 of my friends, look whats that, and they dismissed it as a balloon, but it was quite a windy day and thought it would move more if it was simply just a balloon, and i watched it go in a perfect straight line away from north towards south then it kind of didnt get any further away ,at that point i looked away an within a minute it had disappeared and i did not see it again until about 2 weeks later when again i walked out into another of my friends back garden and looked up on a fairly clear day and seen the black orb shaped object and called my other friend to have a look it was clearly hovering ,not appearing to move away or get any closer it was about 10-15 mins i watched it then went inside for a drink then when i came back out to look it had totally disappeared, but again my friends are not as intrigued as me to find out what these black orbs are and why im seeing so many.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Little black orb in england , coventry  at a high altitude it was in the west and moved slowly northwards.

content.detailedDescription: My husband went outside to have a cigarette i like to star gaze and it had been the first clear night for awhile, so as i was looking out front of my house towards the east i first saw a white, bright light fly across the sky i got excited and ran to see if i could see it better and yelled for my husband to come with me, by the time we got there it was gone, but kept looking up hoping to see it again. as we were watching for that something else appeared in the sky, it was almost see through, but was large circle shape with orange-red glow to it, it glided across the sky fast, but could follow it, it didn't make any noise, but could tell it was some sort of flying object, it was startling and we have no idea what it could have been. weirdest thing i've ever seen!
content.summary: Orange-reddish glowing orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my sister were sleeping at my older sister's home because my parents had gone on a trip.Her house was close to a canal and you could view it from her window.I was asleep on the floor,and i woke up for some reason and looked out the window and saw this white globe that resembled a glow of light from a lantern,which i thought that was what it was at first. but then i saw that the object was floating over the canal,and i got curious to what it could be.After a quick analysis of the matter,i suddenly realized that  there was no way someone could be holding up a lantern over the water unless they were flying in the air.The object would
slowly move from one side of the canal to the other,then it would slowly lower down,as if looking for something.
that is when fear struck me,and i dived under the bed sheets,and began to shake with fear hoping that whatever it was would go away.I must have fallen asleep because that's all i rememeber.I didnt tell anyone about this for a long time.I was just a kid when it happened, right now i am 65 and i remember everything vividly.After this incident,i had three other 
unexplained experiences.One was around 1956 after we had moved to corpus christi.It was around 9 p.M. and i was coming from the corner store,and happened to look up at the sky,which was clear with stars twinkling.Then i noticed what looked like a very tiny meteor,zigzagging from one star to another.I thought to myself thats not possible,but strange.That night i woke up after everyone was asleep,and when i tried to move i couldnt.I tried to move my arms and couldnt,then i tried to move my head to call my mom,and couldnt talk.I could see her room,which was around the corner from
my room,but i couldnt do anything.I became very frightened about what was
happening to me but i couldnt do anything.I finaly must have fell asleep.
the next experience was 3 year later,and we had just moved to another apartment close by.My bedroom was on the second floor,and i remember i was half asleep,to the sensation that i was going out the window.Then i remember waking up,and realizing that i was floating in the air above the trees,and i could see the telephone poles,with the lights.I remember being very frightened and wanting to go back to my room,like trying to forse myself to turn around and go back.Years later i told that to my wife
because my parents were not very understanding of my experiences.For a lot of years i kept this to myself because it didnt make sense.I dont know if all these incidents are connected to what i saw that night in weslaco.
content.summary: White globe object gliding above canal

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the ufo at about 23:08 hrs indian standard time. i noticed the unusual light, (am used to noticing movements as i am a birdwatcher and a naturalist) the direction of the ufo was from west towards south-east and passed close to the most prominent part of scorpius (the 3 starts in a row at the head), took a slow (almost) 90 degree turn towards ophiuchus and it started getting dimmer and seemed to be slowing down. it kept moving in the same direction and after about a minute or so seemed to gain altitude. i kept going to places where i could see it but after a while could not spot it in the sky.

before posting this sighting i took a gps noting from the place i had seen the ufo

n 19,12.629
e 72,49.448

this whole incident lasted for about 5-6 minutes.
content.summary: Glowing fireball moving slower than an airplane

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern.

 

   my name is [cms/tg/pid]. i live in gig harbor washington on the water facing sw towards an area we locally refer to as the purdy (wa) spit. the olympic mountain range is in the back ground.

   last year 09 around march i think it was, i witnessed the comet that came very close to earth on my way home from work one night and i have been looking up ever since because i found it extremely strange that the media made very little mention of this event as that it would have had the same destructive impact as the one in russia around the turn of the century that flattened thousands of acres of forest. i am sure you are aware of both of these events.

   so i purchased a somewhat powerful telescope and have spent many nights since staying up late scanning the stars.

three-four weeks ago while driving down our road at around dusk i saw something. at first i thought it was a very bright star and then realized it was moving. i pulled my truck into the driveway and grabbed my scope, fixed it directly onto the object and viewed something far beyond my knowledge of technology.

   i could see it very clearly through my orion 90 refractor scope. it was the shape of a diamond. the top half was amber red and the bottom half was as bright as a star. it hovered a while at around my guess 20-25 thousand feet and then dropped to around 8-6? in a matter of a minute or two as it approached then just cruised right over the top of us towards mount rainier. it made no sound though i felt like i could hear something like being close to a power line or similar almost like maybe all sound went away, hard to explain. as it passed over i then grabbed my scope and went to the driveway to view it as it moved away. from behind it was no longer the shape of a diamond, it looked liked an elongated circle eight figure of light, all amber red. and no, i am not an alcoholic nor drug addled so i know what i saw.

   two nights ago,coming from the same direction, this time it was around midnight, a round orb like thing with a half circular arc just as bright coming out of the orb from top to bottom. it came from the same elevation and traveled the same direction as the first. then one hour later another one. these objects were without a doubt not planes nor helicopters. we have had quite a bit of f-16 type jets and apache/military looking helicopters buzzing over i think as a result these past few nights. we do not normally see these military type craft directly over us.

   i did some research and found your organization to be the most credible so i thought i would share this with you because, well, i am a rational man who can actually believe what i see with my own eyes and i am now a firm believer that something is going on, and "they" whoever "they" are in our government are very aware of "it".

   there is something else, something that actually makes me a little uneasy to bring up.

several years ago, an acquaintance told me about a phenom known by many as chem-trails. at first i paid him no mind however now i think i am convinced that our government is carrying out these practices routinely. anymore in the greater seattle tacoma/bremerton area, we are lucky to have 1-2 un-obscured blue sky days per month all year long. i watch them regularly with distinct zig zag like patterns, haze up our sky. the jets are usually always solid white or white with a blue underbelly and no insignia (

 refractor scope gets a pretty good zoom in). i used to be skeptical of this but now am getting to the point that i unfortunately believe it to be true, especially after what i have witnessed this past year. i was out the other night trying to find my dog and with my flashlight you could see microscopic glitter like substance falling all around. gold, green, red and yellow/silver. 

  i have never contacted any organization about this stuff.

 you asked about the location. if you look at a map of gig harbor and purdy washington i am on the east side of henderson bay accross from the purdy spit/bridge area, looking towards the spit with the olympics in the back drop.
i have givin you the best description i can and have been completely
honest in all my statements. i do not mind if you call me if you have any other questions.

thank you

 

sincerely

 

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at around 3am looking up at the stars. a storm had passed through, the sky was 30% - 40% overcast. a bright light caught my eye and it was creating a halo around it from the misty cloud is was moving into. i shrugged it off as a satellite catching the sun light, but it was still very eerie as i had never seen a satellite shine so brightly. not even the iss gets as bright as i saw it. it slowly dimmed to a faint point of light slowing moving northeast approx 60 degrees high for about a degree in length and then disappear. i star gazed for about 5 minutes until going back inside my house. just as i opened my back door i looked up to the west about 50 - 60 degrees high to a bright star. i thought it was mars. but after looking at a star chart, i think it was alphekka i was looking at. being in the city and being affected by light pollution, not too many stars are visible, especially in the weather conditions at the time. so i feel safe in saying it was indeed alphekka. anyways, as i was looking at this star i suddenly saw a very bright flash about 5 degrees to the top left of it. i know or a fact i saw it as i was pretty much looking right at it. the first thing that came to mind was "wow, i just saw a supernova". until 5 seconds later it happened again in the same exact spot. it was very bright, if i could speculate, it would be as bright as a nuclear bomb going off if it were as far away as the moon.  i cant say it was a ufo, but it was definitely strange and out of the ordinary.  the color of the flashes and bright moving light was white. 

the photo attached is where i saw the flashes.
content.summary: Bright points of light and flashes

content.detailedDescription:
Friend called and told us to look in the western sky to see if we could see what they were seeing.  they were about ten miles southeast of us.
we could see a light that was much bigger than the brightest stars just hanging in the sky.  it was drifting slowly to the west-northwest horizon.
it was going the opposite direction of just about everything in the sky that night.  it was too big to be a satellite and did not have any faa regulated lights indicating it was a plane.  unlikely to be military as it was too close to the regular landing lanes of authorized aircraft.
content.summary: Bright floating light in western sky

content.detailedDescription: On a path from south to north a bright light, at 9:55 pm cst, in north western sky, flared up like a flash, as if coming through atmosphere, then dimmed down for a few seconds and in a straight lined heading north. white  iss not to fly over tonight wed may 18, 2010, nor was it a satellite which are visible longer with a reddish hue usually, or a plane unless it turned off all faa blinking lights, nor a meteorite cause there was never a tail. visibility was very clear. flash was as bright as the iss flyovers, then dimmed out slowly, slower moving than a meteorite, was traveling as fast (top speed) or a little faster as a commercial airliner but no faa lights just one solid white circular/ ball like, and too big to be a normal commercial airliner at the distance. live 10 miles from airport and see flights all the time. also came through right before the brightest star of virgo. no other commercial traffic for a couple of hours as i live 10 miles away from st.Louis airport, and no flyovers of commercial i've seen in an over an hour. at the distance it was at 10-12 miles away compared to normal comercial traffic it would have been the size of 4-5 707 airplanes for as big as the white circular ball like size.
content.summary: A bright white circle , first it flashed then dimmed out, came out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the back patio while the sunsets like i always do looking at the sky just enyoying the veiw. in the eastern sky i saw something that looked like a star descend at a veryfast speed to the point that you only saw it again when it stoped for a second. i thought i was tripin cause i really don't believe in what i haven't seen before. then this star looking thing was still very high in the sky and it traveled from east to west above me with this amazing speed that you couldn't see it until it stoped again. then it just vanished. i know what i saw. i don't know what it was, but it darn sure wasn't a plane. also at the time i seen this there wasn't a star in the sky yet.
content.summary: It looked like a bright star in the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
It started weeks ago, these small bright lights appearing at night in my back yard. then i started noticing them in the hills surrounding us. (this is a very small valley). they move around in the early morning hours. last week i saw the most beautiful lights rotating around something on the hill, i had never seen such pure white lights! after about 30 min. only two lights remained at that spot. some of the lights are also golden in color.
my family has also seen the lights late at night soaring across the skies. they look like stars at first but then they zig zag around often 
disappearing. i have lost alot of sleep lately to be sure.
during my hike around the valley thismorning, i noticed for the first time what i nicknamed "lake county crop circles" the grasses are about 1.5 ft high right now and it looks like something has just pressed them down in odd rotations. no animal has done this, trust me. they are all over the valley where i live. i have never seen anything like it around here. i believe i counted 32 of them and this is in a small area around my house.
i have also seen what i thought were stars flash very bright, sometimes red but mostly white. they either stay in place or fly away after.
i am not sure what is going on here in hidden valley, but whatever it is, it is increasing. i have only shared this with family as i do not want them to be scared away. and i cannot believe my neighbors havn't noticed! people just dont even look up anymore, they are so into their own heads.
about 3yrs ago my daughter and i were driving near a naval weapons stn. in concord, ca and we saw the hugest black ufo between two hills...Just hovering! so we are not new to this concept.
please write back soon, something is going on around here and like i said it is increasing. but i do not want a bunch of nosy looky loos coming around scaring them away!
i would really like to discuss this with bill birnes but do not know how to contact him...
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have been watching bright lights in this valley for weeks now!

content.detailedDescription: I came home from dinner and was my letting dog out and as usual i stargaze when the stars are visible. so i noticed one bright star that is always there and was looking around and noticed another bright star towards the airport and also noticed there was lots of air traffic, lots of blinking plane lights out in the sky. looking around for a few minutes i noticed a bright star within eyesight of the usual bright star which i didnt notice a minute before, then i stared at it and noticed it was moving, but i stared to look for the blinking airplane lights. it was still at a distance so i thought it was a plane that was too far for me to notice the blinking lights. i continued to stare at it and realized it was a lot closer then i thought it was.  around this point i thought i might be looking at a ufo but was still doubtful because the sky seemed blurry or cloudy so it looked like the light was twinkling still like a star which it looked like except it was moving as fast as a far flying plane. at this point i decided to call my friend from out of the house and started yelling her name but she didnt hear me, so i stared a few seconds longer deciding if i should keep staring at it or go in the house to tell my friend so i ran in the get her and we ran back out and then she reminded me to get my green laser pointer(which supposedly shoots a light two miles) to point it at it so i ran back in to get it, when i was in the house this is when my friend said the light came down fast about a quarter of the total height and was yelling at me to hurry, so i got out to the driveway and of course my laser pointer isnt working so as i'm aiming and pointing the button at the ufo(i guess) the light went towards a thin looking cloud and either dissappeard or the light went out and then that was it.  we waited to see if it would come out of the other side of the cloud which wasnt thick or very big so this is my reasoning for thinking it for sure is not a plane. no sound or anything either.  afterwards we were both pretty excited and still wanted to look around but the mosquitos were bad so my friend went in and took  the dog in and i stayed out until 10pm then came to the computer to see if anybody has seen this around here but nothing that i'm aware of.
content.summary: light came from the airport then appeared next to bright star, flew overhead, then disappeared behind a thin cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in a car with three companions. we we traveling south on a country highway a few miles outside of town. directly in front of us (in line with the road), at an unknown distance, a light appeared in the sky, falling toward the ground. the driver said "oh look, a shooting star". i was sitting in the back seat and the object was high enough in the sky that i had to learn forward quite a bit to see it. at first, it did in fact look just like a shooting star, falling quite fast and appearing to burn out after approximately one second. it reappeared after a very brief pause (less than 0.5 seconds) and began to shine much brighter and fall much faster. it also appeared to be getting quite a bit larger, but whether the object was actually expanding or just getting closer to our position is unknown. at this point, i said "it must be fireworks or something." to which one of my companions replied "there's no way, it was way too high". the white light then turned to green and it continued to get brighter and fall at a very fast rate of speed, before either burning out or falling past the horizon (the darkness and unknown distance made it difficult to tell). overall, it was a very brief sighting, but for the sake of context, after the driver first saw it, i had time to react, change my position in order to see it, and have a brief exchange with my companions all while still viewing the object.
content.summary: Bright light falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription: 5april 2010 eastermonday>fine sunny clear conditions>1400hs>nil wind>one third high light cloud.Temp 16deg.C>humidity 85%>....Taking still&video clips of vintage aircraft,returning from an airshow at wanaka,located in the center of new zealands south island.We are located bottom of the northisland,on the westcoast,on the beach.Aircraft are tracking north along the beach,separated by 5 minute separations,in small formations.I also monitored their radio frequency.First to arrive at my location,hieght 1500ft,as i subseqently learnt,speed 230mph,one curtis kittyhawk,in lockedwing formation with a very rare mitsubishi zero,owned &flown here by an american,both of course ww2 fighters.Range from me,2000ft....Mistakenly,i select "still"mode,instead of video!Dang!....Cheepie 3mpxl camera,so still it is...They travel on to auckland,top of the northisland,where they are based.(warbirds association).Remaining flights are videod.End of the session,i download to computor.It is not until 10april,that i studied my handywork.Not impressed.Didnt even zoom kittyhawk/zero shot....Then i noticed third ariel object lower right of still shot,i knew no other aircraft were around at that time....I used windows fax and image viewer, to look at the area of object...You see the result in the supplied pic "coast 036.Jpg" ...A relative of mine,manages the base where these planes operate from.Enquiries reveal,when the pilots were shown the pic,were unaware of being tracked by this thing,being at thier"7 oclock" almost behind them.I estimate its range 1-2ms offshore to the west(pull up google,center satellite view mode,on my house,8 marine parade,otaki beach,kapiti coast,north island,new zealand)this will pinpoint exact fix....We now move to april 21 2010.In our daily,"dompost"page a13,(capitalday@dompost.Co.Nz) appears two identical in- formation objects very low over the radar station in wellington city,about 50ms south of my location,also apparently accidentaly caught.Very good pics. ....Last week,on twitter,a gentleman in salt lake city,photographed an identical object,.....Sure gets around.....I checked the rest of my photo session results,no sign of anommalies on any of the other stills &clips.
content.summary: Accidently caught on still digital photo

content.detailedDescription: I arrived at home, i was taking out the trash. i always look at the sky to see the stars then, i saw a bright star like object in the sky slowly moving. i ran inside grabbed my camera an took pictures of the object. i had to use the viewfinder and hold one eye open in order to take the pictures. when i looked at the pictures they were much different than what i witnessed. i first notice the object i thought military, drone. the object seemed to be very bright then dim as if it went away. then it seemed to just keep on moving west. i felt a bit nervous after seeing and taking pictures of the object. i went back inside and my daughter looked at me and smiled.
content.summary: Bright star like object in the sky slowly moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see these orbs at the time these two photos were taken. what i have are 2 photos taken about one minute apart. i will be as descriptive as possible but since i did not actually see these, you are seeing just as much as i did by looking at the photos i have attached. i will not call them ufo's because they don't appear to be solid objects, only points of light. i hope they will still be of interest.


i am a full time breakfast manager in a restaurant. these photos were taken out of the drive thru window a little after 7am on saturday, may 15th. the window was open. you can see the roof in the upper righthand corner and the roof of another restaurant across the parking lot. 

i take photos of the sunrise with my camera phone at least twice a week to send to my boyfriend in a good morning message. i've been doing this for at least 4 months. the camera is 3.2 megapixels with autofocus and i have never had any abnormalities on any of the photos (taken before or since) even under similar lighting conditions. these are the only 2 photos out of at least a hundred to ever have orbs appear in them.

it is important to note that i did not see these objects at the time the photos were taken. i didn't notice until later that evening when i was about to delete them from my phone. this does not mean that they weren't visible, but the reason i took the pictures was because of the (4) trails left by planes that were streaking across the rising sun. when looking at the sky, it was too bright to see anything other than the sunshine.

the 2nd photo was taken about a minute after the first photo. i am not 100% sure of the time inbetween photos but you can see the top (plane) trail is much longer in the 2nd picture than in the 1st picture.

in the 1st photo the object is 2 circular lights that do not appear (to me) to have a solid form. in the 2nd photo they have a purple glare, or possibly lights coming out of the sides. i think they have moved in the sky but they remain at the same angle and the same distance apart. 

all i have are these photos. i have not altered them in any way. i attempted to overlap the two using ms paint to determine whether they moved in the sky. i believe they did but i have not included that picture.

again, when you see these two photos you are seeing exactly what i saw since i did not see these until i looked at the photos later that evening. i hope they are helpful or at least interesting.
content.summary: Two circular lights, appeared side by side in front of sun, visible in photos

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting

05-10-10,  9:50-10:30ish pm., 

conditions:  clear/cold/calm;  good visibility; stars clearly visible,  no moon;  altitude 4800'; no sound or vibration; no visible strobe; no red/green wing lghts.; other distant aircraft clearly visible & identifiable

my location: odell lake viewpoint,  hwy. 58 (milepost 65.5), willamette pass,  deschutes  national forest (oregon cascades), crescent lake junction, klamath county, or 97733.

ufo location:  wnw (from my loc.); northern tip of diamond peak wilderness>tumbledown creek fire site> hills creek reservoir>

witnesses: 4 adults

"approx. 9;45 pm, leaving manley's tavern (crscnt. lk. jct.), we noticed an unusually bright light wnw 'hanging' fairly low on the horizon>continued to track it as we drove home to cabin (approx. 3 miles)>light appeared stable/constant/stationary>the closer we drove towards it; the clearer & nearer our view>pulled over at viewpoint, got out to see it over the lake (well above hills/lake/distant cabin lights, etc; used those as reference points)>had time to run inside for binoculars & camera>took several pix  freehand, then rested camera securely on top of a road-reflector post for stabler/fixed shots>kept watching, shooting...And waiting for any change, etc>after 10-15 minutes we got cold & went up into cabin to download & view pix> about 10;30, we went back out to see if it was still there: at first glance it was gone, but suddenly it reappeared for several moments in same location/intensity as before, then 'winked-out' for good."
content.summary: Very large/bright/white light. seemed to be in atmo lower than clouds. ?Venus/saturn?
